reviews.review: когда думаешь что прошёл игру полностью, открываешь мастерскую, и качаешь карты, тогда игра становится на много длиннее)

this is one of the best games about quantum tunneling i've Ever played. the first game was good but this game takes everything good about that first game and improves it. this game is so good you've probably played it before and if you haven't, you should. i own like three copies of it! i would probably buy a forth copy! its a very good game.
It's a great puzzle game that makes you think hard. Not only can you spend hours upon hours on the campaign and co-op, you can also download rooms from other players of the game. 10/10 -me
Great to play with friends late at night, worth the money and super cheap! Only thing is i wish there was more levels. But good enough for 7-16 hours of gameplay.
Ele esta sendo muito legal, diferente do primeiro jogo ele tem uma história mais notável e emocionante!! :)

Things I liked: 
- working with portals
- GladOS
- The game is pretty polished. Looks nice. Runs smooth.
- J.K Simmons

Things I didn't like:
- Too short? I dunno.
Very good physics engine and amazing story. 10/10 would eat the cake again.
It's Portal. What are you even doing if you don't have this game by now?

Best game ever! But play the one first
it's a fun game that lets you mess with portals and solves puzzles. Overall i give it high scores.

Portal but even better.

The best puzzle game ever.
Игра топ. Конец отстой. Это мое мнение
Отличнейшая игра! С великолепным сюжетом, который поглощает с головы до ног! Поражает проработанность персонажей. Их эмоции, душа, харизма! В любой ситуации Portal 👍

Recomendo apenas se voce tiver bastante neuronios porque no começo é ate de boas mas conforme for avançando vai exigindo mais do seu cerebro.
O bom é que nesse jogo voce consegue testar a capacidade do seu cerebro :D

Without a doubt one of the great great games available out there . Totally different amazing community mods tons of free stuff endless replayabiltiy. Have I left anything else out...oh ya I paid 2 bucks on steam for this beauty and I just started doing Co op ...WOW awesome stuff
good game for two player puzzles
Es bastante completo y entretenido el juego, lo recomiendo!
Really fun game for anyone that likes puzzles.
Great game, story was thrilling bt predictable at some points but overall good experiance
Portal je prostě Portal bez parťáka ani ránu.

An amazing game with a great plot although there were some levels that were'nt that interesting they were still very challenging.

if you're looking for a great puzzle with an amazing plot portal 1 and 2 are the games for you

10/10
Esta re piola el juego xdxd
Very good game, I loved the humor
Hikayesiyle muhteşem bir oyun. Arkadaşınız varsa daha çok zevk alacağınız akıcı bir oyun sunmakta.
Très bon jeu pour se prendre la tête sur des énigmes variées.
Just play it, gameplay is awesome, but most importantly, the story is... just play it. Valve's best game.
it has amazing puzzles and i love it! would reccomend
one of the best coop experiences that you will ever have
Great puzzles and fun to play co-op.
Крутое продолжение Portal. Пока полностью не прошел по этому от комментариев воздержусь.
Simplesmente o melhor jogo do mundo, não existe história melhor do que a de portal, consigo zerar 1000 vezes e continuar me fascinando por essa obra de arte. 9999/10
Great, has 65% more game per game!
Another Classical masterpiece and a must play. A solid 80/100. PC MASTER RACE will always remember these VALVE classics... Mamma mia, this game is as hot as my favorite pizza.

Amazing game! Great sequel to a game I didn't think needed one, and in my opinion is even better than the first. The story is amazing, with good puzzles that need much thinking, and the characters are absolutely loveable. It has a mix of elements from the first along with new elements, but the new ones are introduced easily, and are able to be caught on quick. Would recommend!
JOGO MARAVILHOSO, TEM Q USAR MT O RACIOCINÌO PRA PODER PASSAR MT BOM !
Its a great puzzle game. And it is very fun
Ce jeu est génial que ce soit pour la coop ou le solo je vous le conseille

De las mejores entregas que he jugado, me ha fascinado la historia, bastante apta para todo publico, el juego en si tiene unos buenos controles y dificultad. Lastimosamente el Co-op esta muerto pero una gran hazaña se hizo Valve
skvěla hra když chcete do to ho zapojit mozek a lepší když to hrajete s přáteli
